name: Crystal World
description: Explore dazzling crystals and underground ruins in this fantasy map.

name: Desert Raid
description: Venture into ancient tombs and fight bandits in the desert.

name: Sky Islands
description: Jump between floating islands and discover hidden treasures.

name: Jungle Escape
description: Navigate dense jungle terrain full of secrets and dangers.

name: Frozen Depths
description: Delve into icy caves and uncover lost civilizations.

name: Inferno Citadel
description: Face the fiery guardians of a forgotten fortress.
